name: Littering and Loitering
description:
Controls:

Arrow Keys to move (up to jump)

E to knock over trash cans

R to restart

F to switch to endless mode (mostly a debug tool that I left in haha)

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Goal: 

Commit as many horrible atrocities as possible within the 2 minute time limit. Crime points are added by loitering (ie. pausing? lmao) in place until the count ends (2 points) and by knocking over trash cans (1 point). 

There's no way to die, but touching police will lose 5 points.

Don't let your stamina run out! Stand still to recover (recover faster near loiter signs).

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Message:

Heyo, Wren here. This is my second game ever right here! Submitted for the Mini Jam 60. It's not great and I lost a lot of steam working on this project. By the end, I mostly just wanted to see it finished and I'm sure that's reflected in the quality of my game bahaha. I did learn stuff making it though, so mission complete. Still working on figuring out a bunch of stuff, so hopefully next jam will be even better!

I kinda took a different approach to pausing. Making the character stop and wait in place to recover stamina is still a kind of pausing right? Right!? Hahaha
